title: chore: expose balance type
body: expose `balance_type` on `AccountBalance` to prevent making `normal_balance_type` assumptions.

title: chore(deps): bump rust_decimal_macros from 1.37.1 to 1.39.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: rust
labels.description: Pull requests that update Rust code

body:
Bumps [rust_decimal_macros](https://github.com/paupino/rust-decimal) from 1.37.1 to 1.39.0.
Release notes

Sourced from rust_decimal_macros's releases.

1.39.0

What's Changed

  • v1 postgres -> postgres_backend by @​Logarithmus in paupino/rust-decimal#751
  • Remove doc_auto_cfg and address lifetime warnings by @​paupino in paupino/rust-decimal#755
  • Version 1.39.0 by @​paupino in paupino/rust-decimal#756

New Contributors

  • @​Logarithmus made their first contribution in paupino/rust-decimal#751

Full Changelog: https://github.com/paupino/rust-decimal/compare/1.38.0...1.39.0

1.38.0

What's Changed

  • Add new align16 feature to force 16 byte alignment for Decimal by @​Tony-Samuels in paupino/rust-decimal#735
  • Improved exp by @​Danvil in paupino/rust-decimal#739
  • Add #[inline] to Decimal::from_parts (v1 backport) by @​finnbear in paupino/rust-decimal#744
  • Add from_scientific_round, that parses like from_scientific but behaves like from_str for numbers with greater precision that Decimal supports by @​tenuous-guidance in paupino/rust-decimal#746
  • Version 1.38.0 by @​paupino in paupino/rust-decimal#748

Full Changelog: https://github.com/paupino/rust-decimal/compare/1.37.2...1.38.0

1.37.2

What's Changed

  • More efficient is_zero check | v1 by @​ivanrg99 in paupino/rust-decimal#719
  • Fix panic on 0.x parsing by @​Tony-Samuels in paupino/rust-decimal#731

Full Changelog: https://github.com/paupino/rust-decimal/compare/1.37.1...1.37.2

Commits
  • a028cf4 Version 1.39.0 (#756)
  • c52f1f1 Remove doc_auto_cfg and address lifetime warnings (#755)
  • 4bf40bd Merge pull request #751 from Logarithmus/postgres-backend
  • 9da94d0 postgres -> postgres_backend
  • 150291a Version 1.38.0 (#748)
  • 64736ec Merge pull request #746 from tenuous-guidance/v1-from_scientific_round
  • 7da2008 Add from_scientific_round, that parses like from_scientific but behaves like ...
  • 2a0065e Merge pull request #744 from finnbear/patch-2
  • 2b0b9ba Add #[inline] to Decimal::from_parts
  • f010d1b Merge pull request #739 from Danvil/danvil_improved_exp
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

title: feat(nodejs): add bindings for tx_templates create and find_by_code methods
body:
- added `tx_template` bindings
  - `find_by_code` method
  - `create` method (with `transaction` property validation)
- bats tests
  - separated nodejs and rust examples
  - split examples db -- one for rust, the other for nodejs bindings
  - added `reset_server_pg` helper for cleaning up server db between federated sync tests [1]
  - nodejs example checks for accounts and created `tx_template` by its code
- tsx added to `flake.nix` to ensure reproducibility

[1] this was necessary after nodejs bats test was firing off pg_notify triggers on `cala-server-pg`. after nodejs would pass, the triggers would continue to fire when the rust bats test was running, causing sqlx pkey errors.

title: chore(deps): bump serde from 1.0.219 to 1.0.228

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: rust
labels.description: Pull requests that update Rust code

body:
Bumps [serde](https://github.com/serde-rs/serde) from 1.0.219 to 1.0.228.
Release notes

Sourced from serde's releases.

v1.0.228

  • Allow building documentation with RUSTDOCFLAGS='--cfg=docsrs' set for the whole dependency graph (#2995)

v1.0.227

  • Documentation improvements (#2991)

v1.0.226

  • Deduplicate variant matching logic inside generated Deserialize impl for adjacently tagged enums (#2935, thanks @​Mingun)

v1.0.225

  • Avoid triggering a deprecation warning in derived Serialize and Deserialize impls for a data structure that contains its own deprecations (#2879, thanks @​rcrisanti)

v1.0.224

  • Remove private types being suggested in rustc diagnostics (#2979)

v1.0.223

  • Fix serde_core documentation links (#2978)

v1.0.222

  • Make serialize_with attribute produce code that works if respanned to 2024 edition (#2950, thanks @​aytey)

v1.0.221

  • Documentation improvements (#2973)
  • Deprecate serde_if_integer128! macro (#2975)

v1.0.220

  • Add a way for data formats to depend on serde traits without waiting for serde_derive compilation: https://docs.rs/serde_core (#2608, thanks @​osiewicz)
Commits
  • a866b33 Release 1.0.228
  • 5adc9e8 Merge pull request #2995 from dtolnay/rustdocflags
  • ab58178 Workaround for RUSTDOCFLAGS='--cfg=docsrs'
  • 415d9fc Release 1.0.227
  • 7c58427 Merge pull request #2991 from dtolnay/inlinecoredoc
  • 9d3410e Merge pull request #2992 from dtolnay/inplaceseed
  • 2fb6748 Remove InPlaceSeed public re-export
  • f8137c7 Inline serde_core into serde in docsrs mode
  • b7dbf7e Merge pull request #2990 from dtolnay/integer128
  • 7c83691 No longer macro_use integer128 module
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view
